thread.section_title: Gamecheap Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gamecheap | gamecheap.net | 4 of 76
thread.title: Brendon H.

author: Brendon H.
title: Brendon H.
text:
I am very pleased with Game Cheap! Their price for the product was great and their service was exceptional! The product key came via email within minutes and they upgraded the suite from Home edition to Pro Plus! I had some trouble loading the suite, but it was not an issue with Game Cheap. Their custumer service identified the problem and put me in contact with Microsoft customer service who got things fixed.
I would recommend Game Cheap to anyone and will be using them from now on!
